remarks: Every permutation group is a subgroup of the corresponding symmetric group.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Mar-2019.)
statement:
pgrpsubgsymgbi.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
pgrpsubgsymgbi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
pgrpsubgsymgbi $p |- ( A e. V -> ( P e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( P C_ B /\ ( G |`s P ) e. Grp ) ) ) $.
